subtitles.xx: //(0,7)\\Good evening 47. Your target is BRADLEY PAINE, a psychiatrist, specialising in helping individuals to overcome their moral and ethical limitations. And thus, preferred counsellor to mercenaries and terrorists the world over. We have learned that he has been providing this service to Sean Rose’ Militia in Colorado, and that he is en-route that group’s compound. While this is a highly dangerous environment in which to operate, it is never-the-less our best opportunity to engage. In addition to eliminating the target, the client asks that you also eliminate each person he meets and counsels, so as to hamper the Militia’s overall effectiveness. The Target will certainly have a busy schedule amongst the militia’s mercenaries and extremists, but note that he is likely to know most or all of them by face. Plan accordingly. The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
subtitles.en: //(1.05,2.9)\\Good evening, 47.//(2.9,5.5)\\Your target is Bradley Paine,//(5.5,12.2)\\a psychiatrist, specializing in helping individuals to overcome their moral and ethical limitations.//(12.2,17.55)\\And thus, preferred counsellor to mercenaries and terrorists the world over.//(17.55,22.3)\\We have learned that he has been providing this service to Sean Rose’s Militia in Colorado,//(22.3,25.2)\\and that he is en-route to that group’s compound.//(25.2,28.3)\\While this is a highly dangerous environment in which to operate,//(28.3,32.6)\\it is never-the-less our best opportunity to engage.//(32.6,34.6)\\In addition to eliminating the target,//(34.6,39.4)\\the client asks that you also eliminate each patient he meets and counsels,//(39.4,42.65)\\so as to hamper the Militia’s overall effectiveness.//(42.65,46)\\The Target will certainly have a busy schedule amongst militia’s members,//(46,50.2)\\but note that he is likely to know most or all of them by face.//(50.2,52.4)\\Plan accordingly.//(52.4,55.5)\\The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
subtitles.fr: //(1.05,2.9)\\Bonjour, 47.//(2.9,5.5)\\Votre cible est Bradley Paine,//(5.5,11.95)\\un psychiatre qui aide ses patients à repousser leurs limites morales et éthiques.//(12.2,17.25)\\C'est donc le conseiller de prédilection de mercenaires et de terroristes du monde entier.//(17.55,22.3)\\Nous avons appris qu'il venait en aide à la milice de Sean Rose, dans le Colorado.//(22.3,24.9)\\Il est en route pour le complexe du groupe.//(25.2,28.3)\\Même si ce lieu est particulièrement dangereux pour agir,//(28.3,32.1)\\c'est malgré tout la meilleure occasion pour se débarrasser de Paine.//(32.6,34.6)\\En plus d'éliminer la cible,//(34.6,39.4)\\le client demande à éliminer les patients qu'il rencontre et conseille//(39.4,42.65)\\afin de nuire à l'efficacité de la milice.//(42.65,46)\\La cible aura sans doute un emploi du temps chargé avec les membres de la milice,//(46,50.2)\\mais elle connaît sûrement le visage de la plupart de ces hommes.//(50.2,51.5)\\Agissez en conséquence.//(52.4,55.65)\\Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
subtitles.it: //(0.95,2.5)\\Buonasera, 47.//(2.8,5.3)\\Il tuo bersaglio è Bradley Paine,//(5.3,12.05)\\uno psichiatra specializzato nell'aiutare i suoi pazienti a superare i propri limiti etici e morali.//(12.05,17.4)\\In quanto tale, è un consulente molto apprezzato da mercenari e terroristi di tutto il mondo.//(17.4,22.1)\\Abbiamo scoperto che collabora con la milizia di Sean Rose in Colorado//(22.1,24.95)\\e che sta raggiungendo la base del gruppo.//(24.95,31.95)\\Sebbene si tratti di una zona operativa molto rischiosa, non avremo occasioni migliori per avvicinarlo.//(32.5,34.45)\\Oltre a eliminare il bersaglio,//(34.45,39.2)\\il cliente vorrebbe che ti occupassi di qualunque paziente a cui fornisca assistenza,//(39.2,42.6)\\allo scopo di indebolire la milizia.//(42.6,45.8)\\Il bersaglio avrà sicuramente un'agenda densa di appuntamenti con i membri della milizia,//(45.8,51.6)\\ma probabilmente conoscerà l'aspetto di ognuno dei suoi pazienti. Agisci di conseguenza.//(52.3,55.62859)\\Il tempo stringe, 47. Buona fortuna.
subtitles.de: //(1.13,2.5)\\Guten Abend, 47.//(3.08,6.8)\\Ihre Zielperson ist Bradley Paine, ein Psychiater,//(6.8,11.8)\\der Leuten dabei hilft, ihre moralischen und ethischen Grenzen zu überwinden.//(12.47,17.47)\\Er ist weltweit der bevorzugte Therapeut von Söldnern und Terroristen.//(17.75,22.45)\\Wir haben erfahren, dass er derzeit im Dienst der Miliz von Sean Rose in Colorado steht//(22.45,25.2)\\und gerade unterwegs zum Lager dieser Gruppierung ist.//(25.3,28.4)\\Die Umgebungsparameter sind zwar hochgradig gefährlich,//(28.4,32.45)\\aber es ist dennoch unsere beste Chance, ihn auszuschalten.//(32.75,37.5)\\Die Klient möchte, dass Sie nicht nur die Zielperson eliminieren, sondern auch jeden Patienten,//(37.5,42.4)\\der vom Ziel empfangen und beraten wurde, um die Schlagkraft der Miliz zu schwächen.//(42.9,46.2)\\Die Zielperson wird zahlreiche Gespräche mit den Mitgliedern der Miliz führen und sehr beschäftigt sein.//(46.2,50)\\Beachten Sie außerdem, dass er die meisten davon persönlich kennen dürfte.//(50.35,51.45)\\Planen Sie also entsprechend.//(52.55,55.7)\\Die Uhr tickt, 47. Viel Glück.
subtitles.es: //(1.05,2.9)\\Buenas tardes, 47.//(2.9,5.5)\\Tu objetivo es Bradley Paine,//(5.5,11.9)\\un psiquiatra especializado en ayudar a individuos a superar sus limitaciones morales y éticas,//(12.2,17.2)\\y el terapeuta predilecto de grupos de mercenarios y terroristas de todo el mundo.//(17.55,22.3)\\Hemos descubierto que ha estado proporcionando sus servicios a la milicia de Sean Rose en Colorado,//(22.3,24.8)\\y que se dirige al complejo del grupo.//(25.2,28.3)\\Aunque este es un entorno extremadamente peligroso para realizar una operación,//(28.3,32.1)\\me temo que también es nuestra mejor oportunidad para acabar con él.//(32.6,34.6)\\Además de eliminar al objetivo,//(34.6,39.4)\\el cliente quiere que elimines a cada paciente al que trate,//(39.4,42.1)\\para así limitar la eficacia global de la milicia.//(42.65,46)\\Sin duda, el objetivo estará muy ocupado con los miembros de la milicia,//(46,50.2)\\pero te aviso de que es probable que ya conozca en persona a la mayoría de ellos.//(50.2,51.5)\\Tenlo en cuenta para la planificación.//(52.4,55.5)\\El tiempo corre, 47. Buena suerte.
subtitles.ru: //(1.05,2.9)\\Добрый вечер, 47-й.//(2.9,7.5)\\Твоя цель — Брэдли Пейн, психиатр, который специализируется на том,//(7.5,12.2)\\что помогает пациентам преодолевать моральные и этические ограничения.//(12.2,17.2)\\Основные его клиенты — наемники и террористы со всего мира.//(17.55,22.3)\\Нам удалось выяснить, что в данный момент он оказывает услуги группировке боевиков Шона Роуза в Колорадо//(22.3,24.8)\\и сейчас должен быть в их подготовительном лагере.//(25.2,28.3)\\Несмотря на потенциальную опасность работы в таких условиях,//(28.3,32.1)\\мы считаем, что лучшего шанса устранить цель у нас не будет.//(32.6,36.6)\\Помимо Пейна наш клиент просит найти и устранить//(36.6,39)\\каждого пациента, с которым он успел поработать,//(39,42.2)\\это поможет снизить боевой дух группировки и ухудшить общую эффективность бойцов.//(42.65,46)\\У Пейна достаточно плотный график, он должен лично повидаться со всеми своими пациентами,//(46,50.2)\\и помни: скорее всего, он знает их всех — или большую их часть — в лицо.//(50.2,51.5)\\Учти это, когда будешь планировать свои действия.//(52.4,55.5)\\Время пошло, 47-й. Желаю удачи.
subtitles.cn: //(1.05,2.9)\\晚上好，47。//(2.9,5.5)\\你的目标是布兰德利·佩恩，//(5.5,12.2)\\此人是一名精神病学家，致力于帮助他人突破自己的道德伦理限制。//(12.2,17.55)\\因此，他成为了全球雇佣兵与恐怖分子的首选心理辅导师。//(17.55,22.3)\\我们了解到，他一直都在为肖恩·罗斯在科多拉多的民兵组织提供相关服务，//(22.3,25.2)\\而他目前正在前往该地。//(25.2,28.3)\\尽管在当地的行动将会是危机四伏，//(28.3,32.6)\\不过这也是我们最佳的行动机会。//(32.6,34.6)\\除了消灭目标之外，//(34.6,39.4)\\客户还要求你，需要消灭目标曾经接见并进行过诊治的每一位病人，//(39.4,42.65)\\借此降低民兵团体的整体运作。//(42.65,46)\\目标与民兵成员之间的会面日程肯定早已排满，//(46,50.2)\\但他很可能仍会认得大多数以至所有人的长相。//(50.2,52.4)\\请仔细规划行动。//(52.4,55.5)\\时间不等人，47。祝你好运。
subtitles.tc: //(1.05,2.9)\\晚安，47。//(2.9,5.5)\\你的目標布蘭德利・佩恩，//(5.5,12.2)\\此人是一名精神科醫生，致力於幫助他人突破自己的道德倫理限制。//(12.2,17.55)\\因此，他成為了全球僱傭兵與恐怖分子的首選心理輔導顧問。//(17.55,22.3)\\我們了解他，他一直都在為肖恩・羅斯在科羅拉多的民兵組織提供相關服務，//(22.3,25.2)\\而他目前正在前往該地。//(25.2,28.3)\\僅管當地是一個高度危險的行動環境，//(28.3,32.6)\\但這也是我們最佳的下手機會。//(32.6,34.6)\\除了消滅目標之外，//(34.6,39.4)\\客戶還要求你，需要消滅目標曾經接見並進行過診治的每一位病患，//(39.4,42.65)\\藉此降低民兵的整體運作效率。//(42.65,46)\\目標與民兵成員之間的會面日程肯定早已排滿，//(46,50.2)\\但他很可能還是會認得大多數以至所有人的模樣。//(50.2,52.4)\\請仔細規劃行動。//(52.4,55.5)\\時間緊迫，47。祝你好運。
subtitles.jp: //(1.05,2.9)\\Good evening, 47.//(2.9,5.5)\\Your target is Bradley Paine,//(5.5,12.2)\\a psychiatrist, specializing in helping individuals to overcome their moral and ethical limitations.//(12.2,17.55)\\And thus, preferred counsellor to mercenaries and terrorists the world over.//(17.55,22.3)\\We have learned that he has been providing this service to Sean Rose’s Militia in Colorado,//(22.3,25.2)\\and that he is en-route to that group’s compound.//(25.2,28.3)\\While this is a highly dangerous environment in which to operate,//(28.3,32.6)\\it is never-the-less our best opportunity to engage.//(32.6,34.6)\\In addition to eliminating the target,//(34.6,39.4)\\the client asks that you also eliminate each patient he meets and counsels,//(39.4,42.65)\\so as to hamper the Militia’s overall effectiveness.//(42.65,46)\\The Target will certainly have a busy schedule amongst militia’s members,//(46,50.2)\\but note that he is likely to know most or all of them by face.//(50.2,52.4)\\Plan accordingly.//(52.4,55.5)\\The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
